entry.title: WIND WARNING , Kluane Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:42 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 5.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90. High 6. Forecast issued 2:39 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 then to 20 late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 2:39 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 2:39 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
